Package ohos.security.permission

Class PermissionDef

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.security.permission.PermissionDef
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sequenceable

    public class PermissionDef
extends Object
implements Sequenceable
    Provides known system security permissions. The permissions correspond to the content of the def-permissions tag in the harmonyos.profiles file.
    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Security.Permission

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface ohos.utils.Sequenceable

        Sequenceable.Producer<T>

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      int availableScope
      For what kind of application the permission restricts.if not set, no restricted scope for permission applicants.
      int descriptionRes
      A string resource identifier (in the package's resources) of this permission's detailed description.
      static int FLAG_DISCARDED
      Indicates that the permission is discarded.
      int grantMode
      The mode of this permission is granted.it contains SYSTEM_GRANT and USER_GRANT.
      String group
      Group to which this permission belongs.
      int labelRes
      A string resource identifier (in the package's resources) of this permission's brief description.
      String name
      The name of this permission.
      int permissionFlags
      The flag indicating whether the permission has been discarded.
      static int PRIVILEGED
      Privileged-level value for availableScope, only privileged applications can use the permission.
      String reminderDesc
      A string resource identifier (in the package's resources) of this permission's description of continuous reminder.
      int reminderIcon
      A string resource identifier (in the package's resources) of this permission's icon of continuous reminder.
      static int RESTRICTED
      Restricted-level value for availableScope, need to apply to HUAWEI to get this permission.
      static int SIGNATURE
      Signature-level value for availableScope, the signature of the user who defines the permission and the user must be the same.
      static int SYSTEM
      System-level value for availableScope, only be used by system applications and modules, it needs to be declared in the profile.
      static int SYSTEM_GRANT
      Mode of grant permission, system grant mode.
      int usageInfo
      A string resource identifier (in the package's resources) of this permission's usage information.
      static int USER_GRANT
      Mode of grant permission, user grant mode.

      A constructor used to create a PermissionDef instance.

      A constructor used to create a PermissionDef instance using an existing PermissionDef instance.

    • Field Detail

      • FLAG_DISCARDED

        public static final int FLAG_DISCARDED
        Indicates that the permission is discarded.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PRIVILEGED

        public static final int PRIVILEGED
        Privileged-level value for availableScope, only privileged applications can use the permission.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RESTRICTED

        public static final int RESTRICTED
        Restricted-level value for availableScope, need to apply to HUAWEI to get this permission.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SIGNATURE

        public static final int SIGNATURE
        Signature-level value for availableScope, the signature of the user who defines the permission and the user must be the same. after being declared in the profile, the authority management module is responsible for the signature verification and consistency before it can be used.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SYSTEM

        public static final int SYSTEM
        System-level value for availableScope, only be used by system applications and modules, it needs to be declared in the profile.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SYSTEM_GRANT

        public static final int SYSTEM_GRANT
        Mode of grant permission, system grant mode.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • USER_GRANT

        public static final int USER_GRANT
        Mode of grant permission, user grant mode.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • availableScope

        public int availableScope
        For what kind of application the permission restricts.if not set, no restricted scope for permission applicants.

      • descriptionRes

        public int descriptionRes
        A string resource identifier (in the package's resources) of this permission's detailed description. From the "description" attribute or,if not set, 0.

      • grantMode

        public int grantMode
        The mode of this permission is granted.it contains SYSTEM_GRANT and USER_GRANT.

      • group

        public String group
        Group to which this permission belongs.

      • labelRes

        public int labelRes
        A string resource identifier (in the package's resources) of this permission's brief description. From the "label" attribute or,if not set, 0.

      • name

        public String name
        The name of this permission.

      • permissionFlags

        public int permissionFlags
        The flag indicating whether the permission has been discarded.

      • reminderDesc

        public String reminderDesc
        A string resource identifier (in the package's resources) of this permission's description of continuous reminder. From the "reminderDesc" attribute or,if not set, null.

      • reminderIcon

        public int reminderIcon
        A string resource identifier (in the package's resources) of this permission's icon of continuous reminder. From the "reminderDesc" attribute or,if not set, 0.

      • usageInfo

        public int usageInfo
        A string resource identifier (in the package's resources) of this permission's usage information. From the "usageInfo" attribute or,if not set, 0.
